item.title: This senator says Democrats need to invoke villains, namely Elon Musk
item.description: After initially suggesting Democrats focus on “big fights,” Chris Murphy says the party must be more aggressive against Trump’s billionaire allies.

item.title: Trump dismisses archivist to the United States
item.description: The National Archives became the target of Trump’s ire when the independent agency sought to retain documents from his Mar-a-Lago estate in 2022.

item.title: Trump administration cuts teams that fight foreign election interference
item.description: “This is an invitation for more foreign interference,” one expert told The Washington Post.

item.title: Trump’s Gaza proposal frustrates his new Arab American supporters
item.description: Whether Trump can keep these new supporters could have implications for key statewide races, but also on the fragile coalition the GOP assembled to ga...

item.title: In Trump’s actions, opponents see more than cuts — they see a constitutional crisis
item.description: As the White House ignores congressional mandates, the conflict raises questions at the heart of the nation’s founding document.
